thread.title: UK steps up its fight against sugar with new tax

title: UK steps up its fight against sugar with new tax
text:
UK steps up its fight against sugar with new tax 1:10pm EDT - 00:47 
Britain's sugar tax on soft drinks came into effect on Friday, a move that will lead to some higher prices as the country seeks to battle childhood obesity. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Britain's sugar tax on soft drinks came into effect on Friday, a move that will lead to some higher prices as the country seeks to battle childhood obesity. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2qcwgD1
